preface.title: About This Guide
preface.para: &susemgrreg; lets you efficiently manage a set of Linux systems and keep them up-to-date. It provides automated and cost-effective software management, asset management, system provisioning, and monitoring capabilities. &susemgr; is compatible with &rh; Satellite Server and offers seamless management of both &slereg; and &rhel; client systems.
This best practices guide is intended to help customers of &susemgr; configure their client systems more easily.

Many chapters in this manual contain links to additional documentation resources. These include additional documentation that is available on the system as well as documentation available on the Internet.
For an overview of the documentation available for your product and the latest documentation updates, refer to or to the following section.
HTML versions of the manuals are also available from the Help tab of the &susemgr; Web interface.
